question: Find the radian expression for angle B-A-F.
qt_description: Angle B-A-F formed by Line_A_B and Line_F_A at vertex A. Calculated using vector dot product (standard radian form, multiple of π).
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect vertex I with midpoint M_0 (of line L3)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a regular hexagon centered at point O1 with side length 5 is rotated by π/6 radians. A concentric, scaled-down hexagon (scale factor 1/2) is inscribed within it, sharing the same center O1. The outer hexagon has vertices labeled A, B, C, D, E, F in counterclockwise order, and the inner hexagon has vertices labeled G, H, I, J, K, L (with L coinciding with point M_0, the midpoint of side DE of the outer hexagon). In the single enhancement round, a line is drawn connecting vertex I of the inner hexagon to point M_0.

Find the radian measure of angle ∠B-A-F — the angle formed at vertex A between segments AB and AF — expressed as a multiple of π.
